subject: Sports Injuries
Hockey, Ice
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Concussions
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: The league’s chief disciplinarian said he gave the Rangers’ Carl Hagelin a three-game ban largely because Ottawa’s Daniel Alfredsson left the game with what the Senators described as a concussion.
snippet: The league’s chief disciplinarian said he gave the Rangers’ Carl Hagelin a three-game ban largely because Ottawa’s Daniel Alfredsson left the game with what the Senators described as a concussion.
